mapper.insert: insert into post(email,nickname,content,title, created, updated, likes,description,thumbnail,repo_id,usr_id) values(#{email},#{nickname},#{content}, #{title},curdate(), curdate(), 0,#{description},#{thumbnail}, #{repoId},#{usrId})
mapper.select: select * from post where content like concat('%',#{q},'%') or title like concat('%',#{q},'%') order by updated limit #{startPage}, #{endPage}

select p.pid, p.content, p.created, p.description, p.email, p.likes, p.nickname, p.thumbnail, p.title, p.updated from post p, posttag pt, tag t where t.tagname = #{tagname} and t.tagid = pt.tagid and p.pid=pt.pid order by p.updated limit #{startPage}, #{endPage};
select max(pid) from post where pid < #{pid}
select min(pid) from post where pid > #{pid}
select r.id as repoId, r.name as name, r.usr_id as usrId, r.repo_name as repoName, sum(p.likes) likes from repository r join post p where p.repo_id = r.id group by r.id order by likes desc limit 3;
